Vyse received these swords as a gift from his\nfather, Dyne. It is light, with a short blade.
The favorite sword among Air Pirates in the Mid\nOcean area. It is light and very easy to wield.
A cutlass used by Pirates and fishermen alike.\nIts edge is perfect for cleaning fish.
An old sword that once belonged to a Valuan\nAdmiral when he was stationed in Esparanza.
A favorite among assassins of the world, mainly\nbecause it has a chance to poison its target.
An ancient cutlass made from Yeligar's hardened\nskin. Some say it can cut through lightning.
An ancient blade of pre-Old World times, it is\nsaid that this blade was used to cut iron ore.
A cutlass used by desert-faring merchants for\nself-defense, its blade is finely worked stone.
The sword of the great Air Pirate Daccat, it has\nthe power to lull enemies to sleep.
A hunting blade fashioned to resemble a beast's\nfang. A favorite among Ixa'takan warriors.
A blade originally used in masonry work, it has\nsince been modified to be used in combat.
A legendary sword that can supposedly rip the\nfabric of reality and make dreams come true.
A blade so slender that it is fabled to be able\nto cut the very air in half.
A masterpiece of the legendary swordsmith,\nRyu-kan, forged from Velorium.
A short sword used by Yafutoman soldiers, its\nthick, heavy blade is still easy to handle.
The ultimate sword, the best work of the master\nswordsmith, Ryu-kan. Can cause instant death.
Aika's favorite boomerang. It's large but light,\nand relatively easy to aim.
A boomerang shaped like a flying bird. It\nalways returns, no matter how far it is thrown.
A weapon carried by crews of scouting parties,\nit is meant to be fast and deadly.
A boomerang with an icy clear, sharp blade that\nseemingly freezes the air it flies through.
A leather-reinforced boomerang that is very\nsturdy in build, and packs an extra punch.
An ancient weapon found near Sailors' Island.\nThought to have been used for wood & stone work.
A traditional Ixa'takan hunting weapon, children\nare taught to use them from a very young age.
A light boomerang used to practice for the\nannual boomerang contest in the Valuan Coliseum.
A tear-shaped blade crafted by a master\nweaponsmith from a single piece of Moon Stone.
A decorative throwing blade used by Nasrean\ndancers. It is used as a hunting weapon as well.
Crafted in memory of those lost in the Dark Rift\nand in hopes that others will fare better.
Used by guards in an ancient imperial palace,\nthis blade has the power to weaken enemies.
A superb weapon created by the master, Ryu-kan.\nA perfect balance of design and functionality.
A boomerang modified by the Valuan army with\nreinforcement for close-quarters combat.
A boomerang made from a bone of the Green Gigas.\nIts power rivals the Fist of Grendel.
A double-bladed boomerang with an unpredictable\nflight path. It can induce Confuse in enemies.
An artificial life form created by Silvites.\nCupil has been with Fina since she was 4.
Cupil morphs into a lance and lunges itself at\nwhatever enemy Fina commands.
Cupil morphs into a star and spirals towards its\nenemy.
Morphs into a sharp cone, and lunges itself\nat its enemies.
Morphs into a barbed spearhead. Each barb\nhelps Cupil inflict more damage.
Cupil learns the ability to morph into an\nextremely sharp knife.
By morphing into a sword, Cupil can cleave\nalmost any enemy in two.
Cupil learned to morph into a cutlass by\nwatching Vyse fight. Cupil Fury!!!
Morphing into a giant 2-handed sword, Cupil can\ncause massive amounts of damage on any enemy.
Morphs into a small, but heavy, cannonball,\nand drops on an enemy from high above.
Cupil morphs into a spike-laden board and drops\non an enemy's head. It misses a lot, though.
Cupil uses magic to increase its own weight many\ntimes over, and then drops on an enemy's head.
Cupil morphs into a frying pan and uses all of\nits strength to whack enemies over their heads.
Morphs into a club and bludgeons enemies into\nsubmission. Even Cupil has a mean-streak.
Cupil morphs into the shape of a giant hammer\nand hits enemies over their heads.
Cupil's final and ultimate form, it looks very\nimpressive, and packs quite a punch.
A mechanical arm that shows signs of rigorous\nuse over many years, yet it looks sturdy.
An attachment for Drachma's arm, it is a\nhook-shaped blade that is razor sharp.
A heavy, spiked steel ball with awesome\ndestructive power, but low accuracy.
Equipment designed to mine Moon Stones. Created\nby De Loco when he was assigned to Ixa'taka.
An arm specially designed for Drachma by the\nmaster swordsmith, Ryu-kan.
An attachment for Drachma's arm that is shaped\nlike a bird's beak. It can also Confuse enemies.
A drill taken from mining equipment designed by\nDe Loco, its spinning blade can kill instantly.
An instrument designed for archeological digs,\nit can even be used for delicate movements.
A strange arm, based on unknown technology,\nleft behind in the ruins of an ancient city.
Part of an android soldier created by the Silver\nCivilization. Boasts high attack power.
A thin but sharp blade, a symbol of the noble\nwarrior. Can impose Silence on enemies.
A work of genius by the master swordsmith,\nRyu-kan. It can also turn enemies to stone.
The sword of the legitimate heir to the throne.\nCan impose Silence on enemies.
A powerful sword worn by warriors of the Silver\nCivilization. Can turn enemies to Stone.
A blade so sharp and cold, it is almost numbing\nto the touch. It can Confuse enemies.
A large sword used in Yafutoman ceremonies, its\nmysterious powers can put enemies to Sleep.
A gun that has gotten Gilder through many a\ntight spot. Small, but easy to handle.
A replica of the weapon used by the Royal Guard,\nwithout the unnecessary decorative elements.
A small gun used by ancient warriors. Its\nappearance hides its destructive power well.
A stolen Valuan pistol, modified by sailors to\nincrease power, without sacrificing accuracy.
A small pistol used by Valuan assassins. Can\ncause instant death with a good shot.
A long pistol used by the legendary Air Pirate,\nDaccat. Can sometimes put enemies to Sleep.
A gun made specifically to fit Gilder's touch.\nIt has unequaled accuracy and power.
Received from the imposter, Vize.\nBoasts high attack power, but low accuracy.
Received from the imposter, Anita. Will always\nConfuse any enemy not immune to Confuse.
A sword so powerful, it is said that it can\nsplit the heavens. The ultimate sword.
ダミーです。
